title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, December 25, 2019
description: On this day in 1956, Harper Lee’s friends gave her a large sum of money with the instruction to take a year off from working at an airline, and to start writing instead.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1956, Harper Lee’s friends gave her a large sum of money with the instruction to take a year off from working at an airline, and to start writing instead.
